description: Place where the data is stored (location or geospatial scope)
title: StorageLocation

description.description: Provides a general description of the data location (ex: datacenter in EU)

path.description: Specifies the path to access where the data item is stored

name.description: name of the storage medium (name of the database, of the server etc.)

support.description: whether the data is stored digitally or physically

type.description: type of storage medium (ex: paper binder, postgresql database)

storageState.description: Provides information about the state of the storage
